Class Pokemon

cesur.zakaria.pokemonprojectzakariafarih.model.pokemon.pokemons.Pokemon

public class Pokemon extends Object implements Serializable
The Pokemon class represents a Pokemon entity.

      public Pokemon(PokemonSpecie specie, Capacity[] capacities, StatistiquePokemon stat, String nickName)
      Constructs a new Pokemon with the specified species, capacities, statistics, and nickname.
      Parameters:
      specie - The species of the Pokemon.
      capacities - The capacities (moves) of the Pokemon.
      stat - The statistics of the Pokemon.
      nickName - The nickname of the Pokemon.

    • takeDmg

      public boolean takeDmg(int damage)
      Inflicts damage on the Pokemon.
      Parameters:
      damage - The amount of damage to inflict.
      Returns:
      True if the Pokemon still has HP after taking damage, otherwise false.

    • restore

      public void restore()
      Restores the HP of the Pokemon.

    • noMoreFight

      public boolean noMoreFight()
      Checks if the Pokemon can no longer fight.
      Returns:
      True if the Pokemon can no longer fight (i.e., all capacities are unusable), otherwise false.

    • takeDmgCap

      public boolean takeDmgCap(Capacity capUsed)
      Inflicts damage on the Pokemon based on the capacity used.
      Parameters:
      capUsed - The capacity (move) used to inflict damage.
      Returns:
      True if the Pokemon still has HP after taking damage, otherwise false.
